info.name: skUnity Vitreus
info.description: a theme by Pyon-Pyon for Pyon-Pyon
info.additionalInfo:
Update 2.0:

- Added a new scrollbar.
- Colored hover at menus and some other elements.
- Now the mentions are orange.
- Changed some colors

Update 2.5:
- A bit more darker containers.
- Better application of the background (Thanks to Belial for it).
- Removed the title container while replying.
- Changed the color of the scrollbar thumb to a dark light blue.

Update 2.8:
- Fixed a bug where some texts was very dark and not visible
- Changed the selection color to a dark light blue.
- Changed some element hover colors to a light green.
- Some changes at the scrollbar.

Update 2.9

 - Fixed some bugs at the profile page.
 - Now, the username is above the full name.

Update 3.0
 - Fixed some bugs
 - Still changing some colors on the page (that are of the original theme).
 - Changed the font type of the page to Open Sans (supporting some greek, cyrillic, vietnamese and latin characters).
 - More changes that I don't remember.

Update 3.1
 - Fixed a bug on the buttons at the unread section
 - Now the categories and subcategories has its proper hover color.

Update 3.2
 - Fixed some bugs
 - changed some colors at the settings, following and followers section

Update 3.3
 - Changed the color of the text in the code tags to blue (thanks to Syst3ms for the suggestion)
 - Changed the background color of some buttons to a semi-transparent grey (thanks to Syst3ms for the suggestion)
